message.content: cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CYBER, cs.SY - This paper discusses the development of an ethical layer for autonomous robots, which involves the integration of ethical rules into the robot's decision-making process. This topic is closely related to robotics (cs.RO) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), as well as human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and cybersecurity (cs.CYBER) since the ethical behavior of robots can have significant implications for human safety and security. Additionally, the paper presents a series of experiments to validate the proposed architecture, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
